explanation: [0-0] On a white surface in front of a white background, there are two square toys at the back, yellow and orange. On the left side of the front is a yellow cartoon shark toy, and on the right side is an orange fish-shaped toy. A finger points to the shark toy on the left.
[0-2] As the video begins, the hand presses down on the yellow shark toy and then the orange fish-shaped toy. Both toys wiggle their bodies.

[2-7] Next, the shot changes to a pair of hands using pink scissors to cut a yellow piece of paper. Then, the hand places white clay into a yellow bottle cap. The bottle cap is placed on a white platform and spun.

[7-13] The shot changes again to show a white sheet of paper with a cartoon pattern printed on it. A hand holding scissors is cutting the paper. The cut-out cartoon pattern is then pasted onto the previously prepared bottle cap with clay. The yellow cartoon shark toy is now complete. The hand presses the fin of the shark toy, and the toy wiggles its body again.
